text: "Sing" is a 2007 song by Annie Lennox featuring various artists. It is the second single from her fourth studio album Songs of Mass Destruction. It reached the lower edges of the United Kingdom chart and deals with HIV/AIDS. ==Track listing== *;CD single #"Sing" – 4:21 #"Sing" (Nitin Sawhney remix) – 4:49 *;CD maxi single, 12" picture disc #"Sing" – 4:21 #"Sing" (Nitin Sawhney remix) – 4:49 #"Sing" (Dean Coleman Silent Sound vocal remix) – 6:55 #"Sing" (Harry "Choo Choo" Romero club remix) – 8:29 *;Digital download – Remixes # "Sing" (Dean Coleman Silent Sound radio edit) – 4:20 # "Sing" (Moto Blanco radio remix) – 3:33 # "Sing" (Harry "Choo Choo" Romero radio mix) – 3:59 # "Sing" (Harry "Choo Choo" Romero HCCR mix show) – 5:30 # "Sing" (Moto Blanco Club remix) – 8:35 # "Sing" (Moto Blanco dub) – 8:26 # "Sing" (Dean Coleman Silent Sound vocal remix) – 6:54 # "Sing" (Harry "Choo Choo" Romero club mix) – 8:26 == References == Category:2007 songs Category:Annie Lennox songs Category:Madonna songs Category:Anastacia songs Category:Dido songs Category:Celine Dion songs Category:Melissa Etheridge songs Category:Fergie (singer) songs Category:Faith Hill songs Category:Beverley Knight songs Category:Pink (singer) songs Category:Sarah McLachlan songs Category:Shakira songs Category:Sugababes songs Category:Joss Stone songs Category:KT Tunstall songs Category:Bonnie Raitt songs Category:Beth Orton songs
